title: Scene 1 - Paradise Lost
text: Screams, Explosions, all the sounds of panic fill you ears as you're jolted from your statis sleep. Your head swarms with something about a crossroad but you shrug it off. Making it first to the escape pods, you strap yourself in and hit the button. the pod's door slam close, muffering the other passengers panic as your blasted away to god knows where. The computer inside thankfully says your heading to an planet, an unknown one on the edge of settled planets. These Planets are called Rimworlds. The pod buckles and groans as it's thrusters activate, slowing the pod down enough so you're not killed on impact, instead everything goes black as your head slams against the inner walls.
exit_line: This line leads to the next scene.

title: Scene 1A - Planet Fall
text: Your eyes open. Everything hurts, vision blurry, head's pounding. You looks around, a vital monitor attached to your left arm as you lie in a hospital bed. Sterile tile fill the floor. A heater runs in the far corner as art work is scattered around the hospital. You look to your right, a set of shelfs with medical supplies filling them, and beds, 5 others, 4 empty, the last one isn't. Their hulking back is turned to you, making identifying any features hard. The only fact you can get is that they seem to be asleep.

choices.label: Try to get the attention of the sleeping person

exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: Scene 2A - Attempt to Stand
text: You slowly trie to get out of bed, your legs rolling over the bed. You feet touch the cold floor as your legs buckle, nearly sending you crashing to the floor. using the bed to stable yourself, you shuffle to the front of it. Your legs quickly remember how to work as you stumble your way to the door. head swirling as the effects of statis sleep and a concussion attempt to make you heave all over the floor. you get to the door, going to lean on it when it opens, causing you to start to fall. Luckly, you hit a body first. Human from what you can tell as you get held up. "woah woah! I got you." A old voice speaks to you. an arm goes around you, gently leading you back to your hospital bed and lying you back down on the bed.
exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: Scene 2B - trying to wake patient
text: You call out to the individual, and they don't respond. You try again and the figure groans slightly as they shift slightly in their bed. you sit up slightly to try and see them better. As you sit up your head throbs painfully and your hand holds it. Taking a deep a breath you see the door open, and through the pain you can see a woman in her mid 40's
exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: Scene 3 - Mila
text: The woman Smiles at you, a warm comforting one, befoe turning her back to hed to 2 shelfs stacked full of medical supplies."It's a miracle you crash landed with barely any injuries. One of the others showed up like that from a pod and he was torn up bad." She comes with a syringe in one hand along with a piece of cloth. She takes your right arm, feeling around for a vein before wiping it with the cloth" now hold still, it'll sting like a bee but it'll kill the pain." She says, sticking the needle into your arm. It stings, and you clench slightly, But the relief from the painkiller hits not long after.
exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: Scene 4 - Work time
text: After the pain is gone you sigh in relief."There, Should be better now." she disposes of the needle and cloth before looking at you. "You know, Your both unlucky and lucky." she chuckles "might as well explain why. As i mention before, Crashing like that tends to leave you quite wounded, but you only came in with a few scratches and bruises. On the other hand, Due you not be hurted in any serious way.There's a few thing's needing an extra hand on. Least you could do for us pulling you into the safety of our walls." she points to the door north of the room. "Just cross the hall is our small labatory.our group pulled some old world books out of a facility, We just need you to go through them to see if there's any mention of anything important. The other task is a bit more simple. Our walls got hit by artillery a few nights ago during a raid.  We already have someone fixing the walls but a few walls were destroyed completely. Steel in the room just up the hall on your right, Take it over to duo working on the walls.
exit_line: This line leads to the next scene.

title: Scene 4A - Hitting the books
text: Being helped up by the kind lady. She gasps and remembers something."Oh execuse me. I forgot to introduce myself. Everyone else calls me Mila, Resident Cooks, Priest, and doctor. Yes i know, some important hats i gotta fill all at the same time." She follows you to the door to make sure you can make it before going back in to check on the other patient. The lab is across from their hospital. A small room with everything you expect to find in a room detected for research projects. Computers, beakers, blueprints, all that stuff. The book pile isn't hard to find and you pull up a chair to start shifting through them. Old comics, textbooks too worn out to read, one turns to dust when you touched it. after an hour or two, Your starting to wonder if there's anything of use at all. Then you see one book
exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: Scene 4B - Fixing the Breach.
text: Being helped up by the kind lady. She gasps and remembers something."Oh execuse me. I forgot to introduce myself. Everyone else calls me Mila, Resident Cooks, Priest, and doctor. Yes i know, some important hats i gotta fill all at the same time." She follows you to the door to make sure you can make it before going back in to check on the other patient.You head up the hall, Finding the storage room fast. It's cluttered as all hell, needing some good sorting, But that's not what your doing. You find a heavy box of steel that you grab, Hoisting it up to be able to carry it. You walk out a side door to the outside, stopping a moment to shield you eyes from the bright sun. After readjusting to the light, you keep moving forward. moving past Field of corn, Cotten, and a plant that is the equivalent of the old world drug, cocaine. Best not to object to that.

add_item.name: Box of Steel
add_item.desc: A heavy box containing Steel. A common but important material for all sorts of projects. Best to get this to the wall.

exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: Scene 4B2 - Old Discovery.
text: Being helped up by the kind lady. She gasps and remembers something."Oh execuse me. I forgot to introduce myself. Everyone else calls me Mila, Resident Cooks, Priest, and doctor. Yes i know, some important hats i gotta fill all at the same time." She follows you to the door to make sure you can make it before going back in to check on the other patient..

add_item.name: Old Military Notice
add_item.desc: An old Military notice of some Old military base. It asks for more guards to be place on the southern maintenance hallway to keep intruders out.

exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: Scene 5 - The leader
text: You stand up, About to head back out the door. Just as you do the door opens. A armored figure walks in, head convered by an a fancy looking helmet, along with a fancy looking suit of the same armor many others wear.Gold lining and a cape flowing on the back.The helmet has 2 golden wings on the side of it. They are flanked By two individuals. Both Differnt from the people you've seen, Their armor looks the same, but different style.more cleaner then the others you've seen wearing it.The lead woman gestures to you and says something to the other two, who are both wearing helmets, but their body shape can be used to guess the one on the middle's right is male, and the other is female. They both shake their head."Not possible. Our soldiers armor would take too long for them to take off and still disappear like this, And I know my soldiers. This individual you rescued is not one of them." the lead female nods, then looks at you. Thinking "well, I can't spare any help here. Already stretch Thin with repairs of our wall and defenses. Our fighters need to remain here while we repair." She then looks at you and thinks, and sighs "You stranger. Approch."

choices.label: Approch and Confidently Show her the military document
Approch and Don't show her the document

exit_line: This line leads to the next scene.

title: Scene 4B - Fixing the Breach.
text: The walk takes a bit, But eventaully you reach the wall. A large reinforce garage door on one site and a main extrance.Watch towers are built along it. Near the exit of the main extrance sits a defensive hold. Sandbags with Small Auto turrets sits watching the exit. You freeze slightly, But a Voice calls out."Don't worry about those things, The gals in charge already made sure they won't fill you with lead." A voice calls out, slightly higher pitched. turning to the sound you find the duo repairing the wall Mila talked about. A woman, wearing a set of combat armor, and a man wearing a welding mask as he's more focus on repairng the human size gap in the wall. You walk over and set the heavy box down next to the one welding. The woman holds her hand out as the man starts to pull steel from the box to continue his repairs."Name's Kate, Resident Hammerer, And i don't mean building." She says with a wide grin, Your eyes drawing to the large warhammer leaning against a wall. Before she can speak again. A set of footsteps aproach behind you.
exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: Scene 5 - The leader
text: "That's enough Kate, Don't scare them more than they already are." A Figure, with a authoritative, feminine voice.They're cladded in a fancy set of combat armor. Gold lining and a cape flowing on the back.The helmet has 2 golden wings on the side of it. They are flanked By two individuals. Both Differnt from the people you've seen, Their armor looks the same, but different style. A more cleaner then the others you've seen wearing it.The lead woman gestures to you and says something to the other two, who are both wearing helmets, but their body shape can be used to guess the one on the middle's right is male, and the other is female. They both shake their head."Not possible. Our soldiers armor would take too long for them to take off and still disappear like this, And I know my soldiers. This individual you rescued is not one of them." the lead female nods, then looks at you. Thinking "well, I can't spare any help here. Already stretch Thin with repairs of our wall and defenses. Our fighters need to remain here while we repair." She then looks at you and thinks, and sighs "You stranger. Approch."

choices.label: Approch slowly, slightly intimdiated by her pressence. She is armed
Despite everything, Keep your head up and approch with confidence

exit_line: This line leads to the next scene.

title: Scene 5 - Your Mission
text: You take stare at the armor for a bit long. Clearly this is the group's leader, and her hand rests lightly on a sword on her hip. "Here's my offer. Our hands are full with repairs. We have a rough idea on where our allie's missing soldiers are. If you go and find trace of them, I'll offer you a permanent spot as a memeber."
exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: Scene 5 - Your Mission
text: You take a deep breath. Despite the intimidating factor of her height, the sword on her hip, and custom armor marking her as the leader of this group.You walk up to her with your head held."Here's my offer. Our hands are full with repairs. We have a rough idea on where our allie's missing soldiers are. If you go and find trace of them, I'll offer you a permanent spot as a memeber."
exit_line: Continue to the next numbered scene.

title: Scene 6 - We reconing
text: You nod.If you're gonna wanna live to see the day you get off this planet, You're going to have a higher chance with this heavily armed and protected group. At you nod, the woman nods. "Good, Follow me. We, got some gear to assist you in this." She says, turning to walk back to the main building where the hospital and store room are
exit_line: This line leads to the next scene.
